(Simplified: 疱)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 包 indicates the sound; 皮 (skin) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 皮 [ pí ] skin, hide, fur, feathers
    • 包 [ bāo ] wrap, pack, bundle; package
①皮膚上長的像水泡的小疙瘩(亦作“泡”)：水皰。火皰。膿皰。
皰疹 [ pào zhěn ]: blister; bleb (watery blister); herpes (medicine)

皰字的基本解释

皰
pào
同“疱”。

皰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pào］
［《廣韻》匹皃切，去效，滂。］
［《廣韻》防教切，去效，並。］
(1)皮肤上长的像水泡的小疙瘩。
(2)指眼泡。

皰字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皮字部】　皰； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页791第03
【唐韻】旁敎切【集韻】【韻會】皮敎切，?庖去聲。【說文】面生氣也。【徐曰】面瘡也。【博雅】病也。【正字通】凡手足臂肘暴起如水泡者謂之皰。【淮南子·說林訓】潰小皰而發痤疽。【韓愈·食蝦蟇詩】雖然兩股長，其奈脊皴皰。　又【廣韻】匹貌切【集韻】披敎切，?音砲。義同。　【集韻】亦作䩅䶌疱。或作胞?。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pào］
["Guangyun" Pixie cuts, to effect, punishing. ]
["Guangyun" guards against teaching cuts, eliminates effects, and merges. ]
(1) Small bumps that look like blisters on the skin.
(2) Refers to eye bubbles.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Pi Zi Department] 　 blister; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 791 page 03
[Tang Yun] Cut and cut next to [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Cut and cut the skin, and go to the sound. [Said Wen] The face is angry too. [Xu Yue] Face sores too. [Bo Ya] Illness too. 【Zhengzitong】Where the hands, feet, arms and elbows burst like blisters, it is called blister. [Huinanzi·Shuo Lin Xun] Acne caused by ulceration of vesicles. 【Han Yu·Shrimp Poetry】Although two strands are long, its ridge has blisters.　[Guangyun] The appearance of the horse is cut [Jiyun] is cut, and the sound cannon. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】also used as a blister. Or as a cell?.
